SET ( LBFGS_DIR
    ${THIRDPARTY_DIR}/liblbfgs )

SET ( CRFSUITE_DIR
    ${THIRDPARTY_DIR}/crfsuite )

SET ( TINYTHREADPP_DIR
    ${THIRDPARTY_DIR}/tinythreadpp )

SET ( PCRE_DIR
    ${THIRDPARTY_DIR}/pcre )

ADD_SUBDIRECTORY (liblbfgs)
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY (crfsuite)
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY (pcre)
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY (tinythreadpp)
